post0.title: _yt_translate
post0.content: Login to youtube . | Click three dots and select ‘add translations’ . | . Click on `switch language’ and select language you want to add translation for . | . Autotranslate . | . Option: credit my contribution . | . Play stop edit subtitles . | come back to it later as draft is saved for you . | If you want to correct auto translation just click on the cell with text and type . |

page1.title: About Me
page1.content: This is where you put the contents of your About page. Like all your pages, it’s in Markdown format. . This website is powered by fastpages 1. . a blogging platform that natively supports Jupyter notebooks in addition to other formats. ↩ . |
